title: Infra: HumanTask assignment and completion evidence hooks
body: Implement infrastructure evidence logging for HumanTask lifecycle events. On HumanTaskAssigned and HumanTaskCompleted domain events: write an append-only evidence record to the WORM evidence payload store (reuse pattern from bead-0389). Record fields: eventType, humanTaskId, workItemId, runId, stepId, actorId, timestamp, completionNotes (on completion). The evidence record must be retrievable from the cockpit Evidence Log for the parent Work Item. Acceptance: integration test verifying assignment + completion events produce evidence entries; WORM store write (immutable, no-overwrite); evidence surfaced via existing Evidence Log query.

title: Governance: workforce RBAC — manage/assign/complete roles and routing policy
body: Define and implement RBAC rules and routing policy for the workforce layer. RBAC matrix: admin — create/edit WorkforceMember and WorkforceQueue, edit capabilities, assign any member; operator — view directory, assign workforce members to Work Items they own, complete HumanTasks assigned to them; approver — view directory, complete HumanTasks assigned to them; auditor — read-only on all workforce surfaces. Routing policy spec: capability matching rules (task.requiredCapabilities ⊆ member.capabilities), escalation triggers (due date exceeded, member offline), SoD constraints (an approver cannot be the assignee of a human task they must approve). Acceptance: policy rules in governance layer; unit tests for SoD and capability mismatch scenarios; RBAC enforced at application use-case boundary.
